availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Arrasmith Jones in Gallatin County, Kentucky, on January 23, 1842. Father of Alfred Jones, Daniel Jones, Warren Jones, Squire Jones, and William Jones. Married to Mary Jones in Henry County on February 28, 1856. Father of Sarah Ellen Jones, Martha Jones, Isabelle Jones, and Louis H. Jones. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Owned James [Unknown] in Henry County in 1859. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Lockport Precinct, p. 307A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Henry County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Gallatin County Marriages, Film 000509036.
